/cvmfs/atlas.cern.ch/repo/sw/ASG/AnalysisBase/2.4.30/AsgTools/AsgTools/CLASS_DEF.h

00001 // CLASS_DEF.h
00002 
00003 // David Adams
00004 // January 2014
00005 //
00006 // Wrapper for Athena CLASS_DEF macro.
00007 // Ignores the macro in other environments.
00008 //
00009 // Note that the clid command can be used to generate the class ID:
00010 //   clid -m MyClassName
00011 
00012 #include "AsgTools/AsgToolsConf.h"
00013 
00014 // Set this flag to show calls to CLASS_DEF in stanadlone environments.
00015 //#define CLASSDEF_SHOWDEFS
00016 #ifdef ASGTOOL_ATHENA
00017   #undef CLASSDEF_SHOWDEFS
00018 #endif
00019 
00020 #ifdef CLASSDEF_SHOWDEFS
00021 #include <iostream>
00022 int announce(const char* name, int clid) {
00023   std::cout << "*********************** Loading clid for " << name << ": " << clid << std::endl;
00024   return clid;
00025 }
00026 #endif
00027 
00028 #ifdef ASGTOOL_ATHENA
00029   #include "SGTools/CLASS_DEF.h"
00030 #else
00031   #ifdef CLASSDEF_SHOWDEFS
00032     #define CLASS_DEF(NAME, CLID, VER) int clid_CLASS = announce(#NAME, CLID);
00033   #else
00034     // Do not define macro if someone else has already done so.
00035     #ifndef CLASS_DEF
00036       #define CLASS_DEF(NAME, CLID, VER)
00037     #endif
00038   #endif
00039 #endif
Generated on 15 Apr 2017 for RootCore Packages by  1.6.1
